tasks.command: Add-Content -Path "c:\Users\wifel\Desktop\Assets\BFS IT\Projekt\wetter-app\src\style.css" -Value "`n.contributor-card {`n  position: relative;`n}`n`n.contributor-card__rank {`n  position: absolute;`n  top: 8px;`n  right: 8px;`n  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);`n  border-radius: 12px;`n  padding: 2px 6px;`n  font-size: 10px;`n  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);`n  font-weight: bold;`n  font-family: 'Consolas', monospace;`n}`n"
